headline: Stocks to Watch Wednesday Recap: Netflix, QXO, Moderna, SLB
summary: ↘️ Netflix (NFLX): An activist investor with a roughly $200 million stake in Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD) wants it to walk away from its Netflix deal. Ancora says Warner failed to adequately engage with Paramount Skydance (PSKY)’s rival offer.

headline: Is It Time To Reconsider SLB (SLB) After Its Recent 25% Year To Date Rise?
summary: If you are wondering whether SLB at around US$50.32 is offering good value today, it helps to first step back and look at how the market has been treating the stock recently. SLB has posted returns of 1.1% over the last 7 days, 11.3% over the past 30 days, 25.2% year to date and 24.1% over the last year, while its 3 year return sits at a 4.4% decline and its 5 year return at 109.2%. These moves sit against a backdrop of ongoing interest in energy services companies and how they fit into...

headline: SLB Deepens Middle East Role With Long Cycle High Complexity Contracts
summary: SLB (NYSE:SLB) secured a US$1.5b integrated contract with Kuwait Oil Company for the Mutriba field. The company also won multi year service contracts with Saudi Aramco and Petroleum Development Oman across the Middle East. These awards focus on high value, technically complex reservoir development and end to end project work scopes. SLB is a large oilfield services and technology provider, so contract flow is a key indicator of how its tools and expertise are being used in major projects...

summary: ? Warner Bros. Discovery (WBD): Activist investor Ancora has built a roughly $200 million stake in Warner and plans to oppose its deal with Netflix (NFLX). Ancora thinks Warner failed to adequately engage with Paramount Skydance (PSKY)'s rival offer.

headline: Did SLB’s (SLB) US$1.5 Billion Mutriba Deal Just Recast Its Complex Reservoir Narrative?
summary: SLB announced that Kuwait Oil Company previously awarded it a US$1.50 billion, five-year integrated contract for Kuwait’s Mutriba field, covering design, development and production management of complex high-pressure, high-temperature sour reservoirs. The deal highlights SLB’s expanding role in end-to-end development of technically challenging and remote resources, with an emphasis on capital efficiency and environmental considerations. We’ll now examine how this large, integrated Mutriba...
